Project Description
Two WPF controls

A rotating progress/working wheel. Three styles are provided - Internet Explorer, Firefox and Mac OS

An Analog/Radial or circular gauge for displaying values using a needle and scale. Useful for Instrumentation/dashboard applications.

The example applications use Galasoft Mvvm Lite library

Progress Wheel



The progress/working wheel is a direct WPF port of the loading circle project by Martin Gagne. See
http://http://www.codeproject.com/KB/cs/mrg_loadingcircle.aspx for more information.

A demo application is included in the source.

The control is a custom control, so it can be styled.

Analog Gauge

The gauge can be configured for different shapes and scale ranges. It also include "Ranges" and multiple captions. A range is a sector on the gauge which spans a range of the scale.
